metadata.dc:author: Hernández Batuecas, I
Sánchez Sánchez, R
Paz Bouza, J I
González San Martín, F
González Villarón, L
Pérez Arellano, J L
metadata.dc:description: A case of simultaneous double gastric primary neoplasia, lymphoma and adenocarcinoma, is presented. This association having been described in only 11 cases, our case also possessing a deficit of alpha-1-antitrypsin, the implication of which has not been clarified. We review the literature on the variety of gastric neoplasia associations, highlighting the unknown pathogenic aspects.
metadata.dc:title: Doble neoplasia gástrica (linfoma/adenocarcinoma) asociada a déficit de alfa-1 antitripsina. Presentación de un caso y revisión de la literatura.
[Double gastric neoplasia (lymphoma/adenocarcinoma) associated with alpha-1 antitrypsin deficiency. Presentation of a case and review of the literature].
